name: Spooky Underground Labrynth
description:
a short horror game set inside a creepy underground facility.

Armed with a rusty old flashlight, you need to find your way out!

First build, still need to polish it up... This game will probably take you about 10-20 minutes to play through.

basically just messing around when i was building this, took a couple days to bash together from pre-made assets.

let me know any bugs you find or where you have trouble so i can fix it up
